legalCookies.title: Cookies Policy
legalCookies.p1: Arrow Apps only uses technical cookies necessary for the operation of the platform and user authentication.
legalCookies.p2: No analytics, advertising or third-party tracking cookies are used.
legalCookies.p3: For this reason, displaying a cookie banner is not required under current regulations.

legalPrivacy.title: Privacy Policy

legalPrivacy.data3: Minimum technical data necessary for security.

legalPrivacy.p2: Data are not sold or shared with third parties.
legalPrivacy.p3: You may exercise your GDPR rights by writing to arrow.apps.jlv@gmail.com.

legalTermsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
legalTermsAndConditions.intro: These Terms and Conditions set out the rules applicable to the use of Arrow Apps. By accessing, browsing or registering, you agree to comply with them.
legalTermsAndConditions.s1Body: Arrow Apps is a personal web platform in development that allows users to create an account and use the application‚Äôs features.
legalTermsAndConditions.s2Li1: Use the platform lawfully and in good faith.
legalTermsAndConditions.s2Li3: Not to attempt to compromise the security or operation of the site.
legalTermsAndConditions.s3Body: If the service allows publishing or entering content (e.g. profile, bio, etc.), the user is responsible for what they publish and warrants that they have the necessary rights.
legalTermsAndConditions.s4Body: The code, design and site elements belong to the owner or are used under licences that permit their use. Copying or exploiting the site for commercial purposes without authorisation is not permitted.
legalTermsAndConditions.s5Body: The user may stop using the service at any time. The owner may suspend or close accounts in the event of breaches, for security reasons or for service maintenance.
legalTermsAndConditions.s6Body: The site may include links to third parties. The owner does not control such sites nor assumes responsibility for their content or policies.
legalTermsAndConditions.s7Body: The owner may amend these terms to adapt them to service changes or legal requirements. The current version will be available on this page.
legalTermsAndConditions.s8Body: These terms are governed by Spanish law. In the event of a dispute, the parties shall submit to the courts and tribunals having jurisdiction under the applicable regulations.

legalUseTerms.title: Terms of Use
legalUseTerms.intro: These Terms of Use govern access to and use of Arrow Apps. By accessing and using the site, you accept these conditions.
legalUseTerms.s1Body: General access to the site is free of charge. Some features may require registration and sign-in. The owner may modify, suspend or interrupt the service in whole or in part for technical, security or maintenance reasons.
legalUseTerms.s2Li1: You are responsible for the accuracy of the data provided and for keeping them up to date.
legalUseTerms.s2Li2: You are responsible for safeguarding your credentials and for any use made through your account.
legalUseTerms.s2Li3: If you detect unauthorised use, you must notify {email} as soon as possible.
legalUseTerms.s3Intro: You undertake to use the site lawfully and in accordance with:
legalUseTerms.s3Li2: Good faith and respect for others.
legalUseTerms.s4Li1: Accessing or attempting to access areas or data without authorisation.
legalUseTerms.s4Li2: Introducing malware, carrying out attacks, abusive scraping or actions that degrade the service.
legalUseTerms.s4Li3: Using the site for unlawful purposes or in ways that infringe third-party rights.
legalUseTerms.s4Li4: Impersonating identities or maliciously creating accounts with false information.
legalUseTerms.s5Body: If the site allows entering information (e.g. profile, name, bio or other data), the user declares that they have the right to use it and will be solely responsible for what they publish or provide.
legalUseTerms.s6Body: The content, design, code and site elements belong to the owner or are used under licence. Their reproduction or exploitation for commercial purposes without authorisation is not permitted.
legalUseTerms.s7Body: The service is provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù. The owner does not guarantee uninterrupted availability of the site or the absence of errors, although reasonable measures will be taken to maintain its operation and security.
legalUseTerms.s8Body: The owner may suspend or cancel access for users who breach these terms or pose a risk to the security or integrity of the service.
legalUseTerms.s9Body: The site may contain links to third-party pages. The owner does not control nor is responsible for such sites, their content or their policies.
legalUseTerms.s10Body: These Terms of Use may be updated to reflect service changes or legal requirements. The current version will be available on this page.
legalUseTerms.s11Body: These terms are governed by Spanish law. In the event of a dispute, the parties shall submit to the courts and tribunals having jurisdiction under the applicable regulations.
